sn12.24:1.2: Atha kho ayasma sariputto pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagaham pindaya pavisi.
sn12.24:1.5: Yannunaham yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankameyyan”ti.
sn12.24:2.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankami; upasankamitva tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim sammodi.
sn12.24:2.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam sariputtam te annatitthiya paribbajaka etadavocum:
sn12.24:3.1: “Santavuso sariputta, eke samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatam dukkham pannapenti.
sn12.24:3.2: Santi panavuso sariputta, eke samanabrahmana kammavada parankatam dukkham pannapenti.
sn12.24:3.3: Santavuso sariputta, eke samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatanca parankatanca dukkham pannapenti.
sn12.24:3.4: Santi panavuso sariputta, eke samanabrahmana kammavada asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam dukkham pannapenti.
sn12.24:3.5: Idha, panavuso sariputta, samano gotamo kimvadi kimakkhayi?
sn12.24:3.6: Katham byakaramana ca mayam vuttavadino ceva samanassa gotamassa assama, na ca samanam gotamam abhutena abbhacikkheyyama, dhammassa canudhammam byakareyyama, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanupato garayham thanam agaccheyya”ti?
sn12.24:4.4: Iti vadam vuttavadi ceva bhagavato assa, na ca bhagavantam abhutena abbhacikkheyya, dhammassa canudhammam byakareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanupato garayham thanam agaccheyya.
sn12.24:5.1: Tatravuso, ye te samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatam dukkham pannapenti tadapi phassapaccaya.
sn12.24:5.2: Yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada parankatam dukkham pannapenti tadapi phassapaccaya.
sn12.24:5.3: Yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatanca parankatanca dukkham pannapenti tadapi phassapaccaya.
sn12.24:5.4: Yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam dukkham pannapenti tadapi phassapaccaya.
sn12.24:6.1: Tatravuso, ye te samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatam dukkham pannapenti, te vata annatra phassa patisamvedissantiti netam thanam vijjati.
sn12.24:6.2: Yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada parankatam dukkham pannapenti, te vata annatra phassa patisamvedissantiti netam thanam vijjati.
sn12.24:6.3: Yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatanca parankatanca dukkham pannapenti, te vata annatra phassa patisamvedissantiti netam thanam vijjati.
sn12.24:6.4: Yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam dukkham pannapenti, te vata annatra phassa patisamvedissantiti netam thanam vijjati”ti.
sn12.24:7.1: Assosi kho ayasma anando ayasmato sariputtassa tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim imam kathasallapam.
sn12.24:7.2: Atha kho ayasma anando rajagahe pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
sn12.24:7.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando yavatako ayasmato sariputtassa tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim ahosi kathasallapo tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
sn12.24:8.1: “Sadhu sadhu, ananda, yatha tam sariputto samma byakaramano byakareyya.
sn12.24:8.2: Paticcasamuppannam kho, ananda, dukkham vuttam maya.
sn12.24:8.5: Iti vadam vuttavadi ceva me assa, na ca mam abhutena abbhacikkheyya, dhammassa canudhammam byakareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanupato garayham thanam agaccheyya.
sn12.24:9.1: Tatrananda, ye te samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatam dukkham pannapenti tadapi phassapaccaya.
sn12.24:9.4: yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam dukkham pannapenti tadapi phassapaccaya.
sn12.24:10.1: Tatrananda, yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatam dukkham pannapenti, te vata annatra phassa patisamvedissantiti netam thanam vijjati.
sn12.24:10.4: yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam dukkham pannapenti, te vata annatra phassa patisamvedissantiti netam thanam vijjati.
sn12.24:11.1: Ekamidaham, ananda, samayam idheva rajagahe viharami veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn12.24:11.2: Atha khvaham, ananda, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagaham pindaya pavisim.
sn12.24:11.5: Yannunaham yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankameyyan’ti.
sn12.24:12.1: Atha khvaham, ananda, yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam aramo tenupasankamim; upasankamitva tehi annatitthiyehi paribbajakehi saddhim sammodim.
sn12.24:12.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidim. Ekamantam nisinnam kho mam, ananda, te annatitthiya paribbajaka etadavocum:
sn12.24:13.1: ‘Santavuso gotama, eke samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatam dukkham pannapenti.
sn12.24:13.2: Santi panavuso gotama, eke samanabrahmana kammavada parankatam dukkham pannapenti.
sn12.24:13.3: Santavuso gotama, eke samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatanca parankatanca dukkham pannapenti.
sn12.24:13.4: Santi panavuso gotama, eke samanabrahmana kammavada asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam dukkham pannapenti.
sn12.24:13.5: Idha no ayasma gotamo kimvadi kimakkhayi?
sn12.24:13.6: Katham byakaramana ca mayam vuttavadino ceva ayasmato gotamassa assama, na ca ayasmantam gotamam abhutena abbhacikkheyyama, dhammassa canudhammam byakareyyama, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanupato garayham thanam agaccheyya’ti?
sn12.24:14.1: Evam vuttaham, ananda, te annatitthiye paribbajake etadavocam:
sn12.24:14.5: Iti vadam vuttavadi ceva me assa, na ca mam abhutena abbhacikkheyya, dhammassa canudhammam byakareyya, na ca koci sahadhammiko vadanupato garayham thanam agaccheyyati.
sn12.24:15.1: Tatravuso, ye te samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatam dukkham pannapenti tadapi phassapaccaya.
sn12.24:15.4: yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam dukkham pannapenti tadapi phassapaccaya.
sn12.24:16.1: Tatravuso, ye te samanabrahmana kammavada sayankatam dukkham pannapenti, te vata annatra phassa patisamvedissantiti netam thanam vijjati.
sn12.24:16.4: yepi te samanabrahmana kammavada asayankaram aparankaram adhiccasamuppannam dukkham pannapenti, te vata annatra phassa patisamvedissantiti netam thanam vijjati’”ti.
sn12.24:17.2: Yatra hi nama ekena padena sabbo attho vutto bhavissati.
sn12.24:17.3: Siya nu kho, bhante, esevattho vittharena vuccamano gambhiro ceva assa gambhiravabhaso ca”ti?
sn12.24:18.3: ‘jaramaranam, avuso ananda, kimnidanam kimsamudayam kimjatikam kimpabhavan’ti?
sn12.24:18.5: ‘jaramaranam kho, avuso, jatinidanam jatisamudayam jatijatikam jatipabhavan’ti.
sn12.24:19.2: ‘jati panavuso ananda, kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava’ti?
sn12.24:19.4: ‘jati kho, avuso, bhavanidana bhavasamudaya bhavajatika bhavappabhava’ti.
sn12.24:20.2: ‘bhavo panavuso ananda, kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo’ti?
sn12.24:20.4: ‘bhavo kho, avuso, upadananidano upadanasamudayo upadanajatiko upadanappabhavo’ti.
sn12.24:21.6: ‘phasso panavuso ananda, kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo’ti?
sn12.24:21.8: ‘phasso kho, avuso, salayatananidano salayatanasamudayo salayatanajatiko salayatanappabhavo’ti.
